Session 1 - 2/3/2025

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Approaching BIllowbellow - outskirts of Califia - not quite on the outskirts of the influence of the Potentate
  • Used to be the most productive oilfield on the continent
  • Notice oil derricks dotting the landscape, most of them no longer in use
  • Traveling through dense landscapes. It is evening time. We make camp and prepare to rest. Hear chorus of frog-like creatures in the distance, realize they are intelligent creatures, Bullywugs (Humanoid race of frog people - same size as ...
  • Oz listens in on the Bullywug conversation (with a spell). Know that they are talking about a trade with the kobolds for weapons. Group of gnomes would be traded for weapons from the kobolds (know they are draconic lizard people… like sm...
  • Suspect there are at least six Bullywugs. Can’t make out the number of gnomes. Seems this is happening about a mile away.
  • We decide this is a gnomish rights violation and want to do something
  • Bart stealths up to them and sees about a dozen gnomes with the Bullywugs marching in chains to an abandoned looking castle
  • Bart comes back to tell us what he saw
  • Half a mile away Billowbarrow, the town
  • We decide to save the gnomes!
  • I splash around in the water (failing a jump) so they know we’re coming
  • Oz is trying to negotiate for us to get the gnomes without fighting the Bullywugs
  • Did it! Traded a quarterstaff for a dozen gnomes
